document.full_text: the weekend box office could see a close battle between three new titles -- relativity media's bradley cooper starrer "limitless," lionsgate's matthew mcconaughey legal thriller "the lincoln lawyer" and universal's raunchy alien comedy "paul."
document.title: a trio of new entries enter crowded box office field
lines_and_colors: the weekend box office could see a close battle between three new titles -- relativity media's bradley cooper starrer "limitless," lionsgate's matthew mcconaughey legal thriller "the lincoln lawyer" and universal's raunchy alien comedy "paul."
